Lack enough support: The claim lacks specific data or evidence to support the statement that the United States produces more oil than it buys from the rest of the world.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that increased domestic oil production is solely due to the efforts of the Obama administration and their "all-of-the-above strategy for American energy," without considering other factors.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert mentions that reduced demand and increased energy efficiency are also contributing factors to the United States producing more oil than it imports, suggesting that the claim may not provide a complete explanation of the situation.
